page.title: 15FUTURE DEVELOPMENT.
page.content:
July 1985.
The only development in the area at present is the further extension to the{Saltergate}Estate on the western side of the area. This now stretches up the Skipton Road nearly to Killinghall Moor Farm at Four Lane Ends (the junction of the A59 and the B6161). Future plans at present being discussed include the building of a northern-bypass across the north of the Bilton area and futher housing and and industrial and commercial development along the route. As this is in the present{Green Belt}between Harrogate and Knaresborough this is being vigorously opposed by residents of this area.
